channel.title: Bounty Bouncer 317, PI
channel.description:
As i have searched for Bounty hunter on a PI, and i didnt find it. i decided to make one my self.
I wanna make a eco based on the bounty hunter, and if it gets a succes i will add more stuff. I will keep this thread up to date and i gona start right now.
i will using MTP from marcbob as base because i love the combat.
Project status: 3/100%
30 november 2011: [img]http://i42.servimg.com/u/f42/16/52/06/54/bounty10.png[/img] * Cleaning the base * Finding 508 Cache * Added Bounty hunter Skull sprites to cache *
